name: hono-function-template
description: Template for creating WASM functions with Hono.js that comply with SystemLink Function Management Service requirements

scripts.build:wit: wkg wit fetch  || echo "wkg failed, skipping wit fetch"
scripts.build:wasm: mkdirp dist && jco componentize -w wit -n main-world -o dist/main.wasm objs/bundled/main.js
scripts.build: node --run build:wit && node --run build:wit:types && node --run build:js && node --run build:wasm
